ABOUT OUR AXE THROWING VENUE
1 HOUR
$28 per person +tax
Booking is Recommended
Walk-ins are subject to availability
2 HOURS
$46 per person +tax
Booking is Recommended
Walk-ins are subject to availability
Welcome to an axe throwing experience unlike any other â€“ where precision meets Axe-citement in an unforgettable setting!
Our venue is thrilled to offer you the choice of 1-hour and 2-hour axe throwing sessions that promise to ignite your competitive spirit. With an impressive lineup of 8 meticulously designed axe lanes, you and your companions are in for a treat as you take on the challenge of hitting those bullseyes.
What sets us apart is our dedication to enhancing your satisfaction. Our axe lanes feature auto-detect scoring, and projection targets, transforming the art of aiming into an engaging array of 18 various games. These dynamic targets are projected onto end grain wood, creating a perfect surface for your axe to stick with ease, ensuring that every throw delivers that satisfying thud you're craving.
Safety is our top priority, which is why our venue provides 8 lanes with a patent-pending no-bounce-back border to create a secure environment, eliminating the risk of axes rebounding unexpectedly. You can focus on your throws with confidence.
So, gather your friends, family, or colleagues and step into a world where axe throwing mastery is within your grasp. Our friendly staff is always on hand to offer guidance, tips, and a warm welcome. Whether you're a seasoned axe enthusiast or just trying it out for the first time, our venue guarantees an unforgettable experience.
Book Now!!

ABOUT
SPLIT OAK AXESCAPE GAMES
Split Oak Axescape Games is the first axe throwing and escape room venue in St. Cloud, Florida. Our goal is to provide you with a new experience filled with action and excitement in a safe, friendly, and healthy environment. We serve small bites, an array of craft & domestic beer, wine, and hard seltzers.
Split Oak Axescape Games is committed to providing the best axe throwing and escape room experience for all size groups. Whether you want to throw alone, with a friend, or with the whole family, we will ensure you have an axetraordinary time. We also have 2 one hour themed escape rooms to experience with your group if axe throwing isnâ€™t your thing. We can accommodate group parties, private events as well as team-building and corporate events. Our team of Game Guides is here to keep our guests safe and create a fun and unforgettable experience.
Our venue has a modern industrial vibe with relaxed seating and spans over 4,500 square feet of interior space that can be enjoyed with flat-screen TVs and lobby games.
Split Oak Axescape GamesÂ were founded by Robert & Nichole, residents of Lake Nona, with the vision to provide a modern industrial community gathering place for all to enjoy.
AXE THROWING TIPS & TECHNIQUES
July 11, 2023
AXE THROWING STANCE
The most important tip for axe throwing technique is your stance. There are two stances: two-handed and one-handed.
Two-handed Stance: Align your feet with the bullseye and keep your body facing forward as you throw. (
Easiest for Beginners
)
One-handed Stance: Align your shoulder with the bullseye and maintain a forward-facing stance, focusing on shoulder-to-target alignment. (
Advanced Approach
)
AXE REMOVAL
Taking an axe out of a target can be tricky. The best and safest way to do so is to grasp the handle and shift the axe blade up and down until it gradually falls loose from the target. Do not grab the axe and try to pull it straight out. This could result in it coming out quickly and potentially causing serious harm or injury.
WATCH OUT FOR PEOPLE AND OBSTACLES
Before you throw your axe at your intended wooden target, make sure there is no one and nothing in your way. You should be standing in front of the target, about 12 ft from it. Nobody, not even the most experienced axe thrower, should ever throw without double-checking their surroundings. Maintain a six-foot radius around where you are standing to assure you wonâ€™t harm anyone.
HOW TO AIM YOUR AXE
When aiming your axe, it is essential to maintain focus on the target. Keep your eyes locked onto the specific spot where you want the axe to land and throw with precision. Directing your gaze toward the desired destination increases your chances of hitting the mark accurately. By staying focused and aligning your vision with your intended target, you enhance your chances of achieving your desired outcome.
DISTANCE ADJUSTMENTS
Different outcomes can occur when throwing an axe at a target, and adjustments can be made to improve your throws:
Top of Axe Hits Board:
If the handle sticks out almost perpendicular to the board while the axe goes into the target, it indicates over-rotation. To compensate, take a half step closer to the target.
Bottom of Axe Hits Board:
When the bottom or handle of the axe hits the target, you are standing too close. It suggests under-rotation. To correct this, take a half step back from the target.
Blade Hits Parallel to Board:
This is the desired outcome. The axe handle will be nearly parallel to the target, and the front of the blade will be embedded in the target. It signifies the right distance from the target and excellent throwing form.
ESCAPE ROOM TIPS & TRICKS
DONâ€™T JUST STAND THERE!
Be active and engage with the environment. Explore and interact with objects to find clues.
WORK FAST AND ASK FOR CLUES
Donâ€™t hesitate to ask for hints early and often. Waiting until the end might leave you short on time.
WORK TOGETHER
Work as a team but spread out to find clues throughout the room.
COLLABORATE YOUR SKILL SETS
Utilize the diverse skills within your team. Try different perspectives if stuck.
THINK OUTSIDE THE BOX
Get creative and think like a storyteller or director when stuck. Let the narrative guide your reasoning.
SHARE WHAT YOU SEE AND FIND
Communicate all findings and thoughts to the team. Sharing is the key to solving puzzles.
POLICIES
PLEASE READ AND UNDERSTAND THIS FULLY
NO REFUNDS
No refunds for late arrivals, no-shows, or cancellations.
Strict adherence to the schedule is required.
CHECK-IN
Check-in is
15 minutes prior
to booking time to allow time for briefs and rules video.
CHANGES TO BOOKING
Changes to bookings allowed up to
24 hours in advance
.
NO SHOWS
No-shows are defined as failing to arrive within 15 minutes of the scheduled booking time. No-shows result in cancellation and fees are
NOT
refunded.
LATE ARRIVALS
Late arrivals lead to reduced throw/game time. Your time starts at the booked time, not when you arrive. The throw/game time is over when your allotted time runs out, regardless of the groupâ€™s tardy beginnings. Stay sharp and timely.

Memberships
Join Split Oak Axescape Games membership today and unlock an incredible world of savings and exhilarating fun! By becoming a member, you gain exclusive access to special pricing on axe-throwing sessions, ensuring that you can enjoy this thrilling and engaging activity at a much lower cost. Members receive fantastic discounted rates on both our refreshing alcoholic and tasty non-alcoholic drinks, as well as on the captivating escape room experiences offered by our facility. It's truly the perfect way to unwind and relax after successfully solving puzzles and overcoming challenges with friends or family. Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced thrower, our welcoming and supportive environment will significantly enhance your skills while you bond and connect with fellow enthusiasts. Sign up now to maximize your fun and savings, and discover the excitement of axe throwing at Split Oak Axescape Games!
Axe Legend
$69.00 a month
$10 copay each throwing session
20 throwing sessions each month
Free throwing session of ONE NEW guest
15% discount on alcoholic drinks
20% discount on non-alcoholic drinks
20% off Escape room discount for a group of 4 or more
become a member
Master Axe
$49.00 a month
$10 copay each throwing session
15 throwing sessions each month
Bring ONE NEW guest for $10
10% discount on alcoholic drinks
15% discount on non-alcoholic drinks
10% off Escape room discount for a group of 4 or more
become a member
Timber Toss
$29.00 a month
$10 copay each throwing session
10 throwing sessions each month
Bring ONE NEW guest for $15
10% discount on non-alcoholic drinks
become a member
Terms and Conditions
By participating in Split Oak Axescape Games, you agree to our terms and safety guidelines. Participants must meet minimum age requirements; those under legal age need an adult. We may refuse service to anyone not complying with these terms or behaving disruptively. Participants are responsible for their actions and belongings. By participating, you waive claims against us for injury or damage during your visit. Terms may be updated; it's your responsibility to stay informed.
By signing up for a membership with Split Oak Axescape Games, you agree to be enrolled in an automatic recurring monthly payment and are agreeing to the terms and conditions. The list price is subjected to tax, and each session is limited to one hour of gameplay. Guest co-pay is limited to ONE NEW guest per month. It is your responsibility to cancel a membership 30 days in writing BEFORE being charged the recurring bill for the next month.
PROOF OF ID WILL BE REQUIRED
